nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util

Class ResumptionToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.api.util.ResumptionToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IResumptionTokenGenerator, IResumptionTokenParser

    public class ResumptionToken
extends Object
implements IResumptionTokenParser, IResumptionTokenGenerator
    An implementation of IResumptionTokenParser and IResumptionTokenGenerator that is propably suitable for most IOAIRepository implementations. This implementation encodes/decodes the following information into/from the resumption token:
    1. The from date
    2. The until date
    3. The requested data set
    4. The requested page
    5. The metadataPrefix
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

      Generate a resumption token for the request following the specified request.
      void decompose(OAIPMHRequest request)
      Decompose the resumption token within the specified request object into its constituent parts and use these to set the other properties in the request object.
      OAIPMHRequest decompose(String resumptionToken)
      Decompose the specified resumption token into its constituent parts and create a new OAIPMHRequest instance from them.

      • compose

        public String compose(OAIPMHRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: IResumptionTokenGenerator
        Generate a resumption token for the request following the specified request. For example, assuming the repository is configured to hand out 50 records per request and the specified request's record offset is 300, then a resumption token must be generated with a record offset of 350.
        Specified by:
        compose in interface IResumptionTokenGenerator
        Returns:
